DarkMouse::

She looked on the scanners and saw what was goingon outside. "Of all 
the slagging.." She ran towards the armory and looked around. She 
grabbed a plasma cannon and ran back to the entrance. She opened the 
doors just enough to squeeze through. Then she armed the cannon and 
opened fire on Bounty.
